title: King ADA Accessible Guest Room with Roll-in Shower
Amenities: Exclusive direct-dial service with Net-a-Porter, Specially-designed 400 thread SFERRA, luxury linens and towels, Intelity bedside touch-screen controls, Samsung 46" HD LED television, Bespoke DayNa Decker bath and body products, Professional hair styling system by gHD featuring blow dryer ensuite and flat iron on request, two high performance products, Work desk and ergonomic chair, Dual-line telephones with conferencing capabilities, Custom-made furnishings and fittings throughout, Glass-front rain showers, Pull-out full-size sofa bed, Exterior Facing Room, Grab bars in Shower, Grab bars by toilet, Lower desk (29.5”), Door width (36”), Double peepholes (45" and 57”), Visual fire alarm, Roll-in shower (with transfer seat), Door-knock alert (upon request), TTY - Text telephone (upon request), In-line phone amplifier (upon request), Phone ring signaler (upon request), Clocks with bed shaker (upon request)
seo_title: King ADA Accessible Guest Room with Roll-in Shower
seo_description: The WestHouse King Accessible bedroom with roll-in shower offers 295 square feet of living space and views of vibrant city life. Enabled with complimentary Wi-Fi, marble writing desks, and beveled mirrors, these rooms are equally suited for business or pleasure and are ADA accessible with roll-in showers, along with many other accessible features.
